thread.title: Sinclair to Raise $1.5 Billion by Selling Stations

author: Austen Hufford
title: Sinclair to Raise $1.5 Billion by Selling Stations

organizations.name: selling stations sinclair broadcast group inc.

text:
Sinclair Broadcast Group Inc. said Wednesday that it will raise about $1.5 billion from the sale of the nearly two dozen television stations to gain regulatorsâ€™ approval for its purchase of Tribune Media Co.
Sinclair announced the sale of the stations last month to parties including Standard Media Group LLC, Meredith Corp., Howard Stirk and Cunningham Broadcasting Corp., and an unnamed buyer. 21st Century Fox Inc. said Wednesday it is buying seven of those stations for about $910 million.
...
